title: Samuel R. Delany
data: Published as Ace-Double F-173 together with Second Ending by James White
Published as Ace-Double F-199 together with The Psionic Menace by John Brunner , republished as the more definitive Out of the Dead City included in omnibus edition : The Fall of the Towers
Published as Ace-Double F-261 together with The Lunar Eye by Robert Moore Williams , included in omnibus edition : The Fall of the Towers
Published by Ace Books as F-322 , included in omnibus edition : The Fall of the Towers
Published as Ace-Double M-121 together with Alpha Yes , Terra No ! by Emil Petaja ; Nebula Award nominee , 1965
Published as Ace-Double M-139 together with The Tree Lord of Imeten by Tom Purdom
Published by Ace Books as F-388 , Nebula Award winner , 1966 ; Hugo Award nominee , 1967
Published by Ace Books as F-427 , Nebula Award winner , 1967 Hugo Award nominee , 1968
